text: Soongsil University (Salpijae) Station is a station on Line 7 of the Seoul Subway. As its name indicates, it serves the nearby Soongsil University. ==Station layout== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || S/B N/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- ! Southbound | ← ●Line 7 toward |- ! title: Soongsil University station
